record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 3547
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 3547 -- (House of Representatives - October 30, 2007)

[Page: H12208]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that my name be removed as a cosponsor of H.R. 3547.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Georgia?
